QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Learn about gluten-free diets
QAPair.Answer: On a gluten-free diet, you do not eat wheat, rye, and barley. These foods contain gluten, a type of protein. A gluten-free diet is the main treatment for celiac disease . Some people believe a gluten-free diet can also help improve other health problems, but there is little research to support this idea.
